longBusinessSummary: Gardiner Healthcare Acquisitions Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It focuses on identifying and acquiring a business in the healthcare or healthcare related industries. Gardiner Healthcare Acquisitions Corp. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Shaker Heights, Ohio.

companyOfficers.name: Dr. Paul R. McGuirk Ph.D.
companyOfficers.title: Exec. VP, Chief Devel. Officer & Director
